Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Based on your recent request for changes and/or additions to your order, LegalZoom requires additional information to complete your request. You will be credited your initial purchase amount to allow you to re-enter the website and complete a new order. This email is to confirm that a store credit in the amount of $299.00 for order #XXXXXXXXXXX has been applied to your account. This credit is good for 60 days and can be used towards the purchase of your new LegalZoom order.
To use your credit, simply go to www.legalzoom.com :
- Sign in using the same email address and password used on your credited order.
- Select the Divorce product.
- During checkout your credit will be automatically applied to the order total.
- Any remaining credit will be automatically refunded to you.
- Within the special instructions of your questionnaire add ?revision for order #XXXXXXXXXX? (to reference your old order number)
- Reference the attached previously completed questionnaire to assist you in completion of your revisions.
- LegalZoom will complete your order within 5-7 business days.
You can check your available store credit balance by visiting www.legalzoom.com and logging in to My Account.
